error403.title: Access Forbidden
error403.subtitle: You do not have permission to access this page
error403.description: Sorry, you don't have the required permissions to view this content. Please contact your administrator for access.

suggestions.title: You can:
suggestions.item1: Check if you're logged in with the correct account
suggestions.item2: Contact your administrator for access permissions

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.subtitle: Learn about our refund process and wallet withdrawal instructions

overview.title: Refund Overview
overview.content: We are committed to providing quality service experience. If you are unsatisfied with your purchase, you may request a refund according to our refund policy. Refunds will be credited to your account wallet balance.

refundProcess.title: Refund Process
refundProcess.content: When your refund request is approved, the refund amount will be immediately credited to your account wallet balance. You can use the wallet balance to continue purchasing our services or request withdrawal to your cryptocurrency wallet address.

walletBalance.title: Wallet Balance Information
walletBalance.content: Wallet balance is your virtual account balance on the Kaitu platform, which can be used for: 1. Purchasing or renewing any service plan; 2. Withdrawing to supported cryptocurrency wallets. Refunds to wallet are available immediately, no waiting required.

withdrawalMethods.title: Withdrawal Methods
withdrawalMethods.content: We support withdrawing wallet balance to mainstream cryptocurrency wallets. Supported cryptocurrencies include:

supportedCryptos.title: Supported Cryptocurrencies
supportedCryptos.usdt: USDT (Tether) - Supports TRC20 and ERC20 networks
supportedCryptos.other: Other mainstream stablecoins and cryptocurrencies (please contact support for confirmation)

withdrawalProcess.title: Withdrawal Process
withdrawalProcess.step2: 2. Select cryptocurrency type and blockchain network
withdrawalProcess.step6: 6. Upon approval, funds will arrive within 1-3 working days

importantNotes.title: Important Notice
importantNotes.note1: • Please ensure the provided wallet address and blockchain network are correct
importantNotes.note2: • Users are responsible for fund losses due to incorrect wallet addresses
importantNotes.note3: • Withdrawal fees may vary for different cryptocurrencies and networks
importantNotes.note4: • Withdrawal requests cannot be cancelled once submitted, please proceed with caution
importantNotes.note5: • First-time withdrawals may require identity verification
importantNotes.note6: • Large withdrawals may require additional security review

withdrawalFees.title: Withdrawal Fees
withdrawalFees.content: Withdrawal fees vary depending on the cryptocurrency and blockchain network. Specific fees will be displayed when you request withdrawal. We will endeavour to process withdrawals on networks with lower fees.

processingTime.title: Processing Time
processingTime.content: Withdrawal requests will be processed within 1-3 working days. Actual arrival time depends on blockchain network confirmation speed. During peak periods or network congestion, arrival time may be extended.

refundPolicy.title: Refund Conditions
refundPolicy.content: Refund requests must meet the following conditions: service not exceeding 7 days, no excessive data usage, normal account status, etc. For specific refund conditions, please refer to Terms of Service or contact customer support for enquiries.

contact.title: Contact Support
contact.content: If you have any questions about refunds or withdrawals, please contact our support team at any time: support@kaitu.io
